member.name: M:Cassandra.Data.CqlConnection.OnBuildingCluster(Cassandra.Builder)
member.summary:
To be overriden in child classes to change the default settings for building a .
For example, some clients might want to specify the when building the so that the clients could talk to only the hosts in specified datacenter for better performance.
